attributes.action:
Support NHS. 
Medical care is not free. 
Cost important, recover for uninsured
attributes.additional_details:
Pressures of our NHS are at breaking point. £200m is an approximate figure spent on British taxpayers recovering costs for treated patients without insurance or indeed payment back for treatment. 

Time to change
attributes.background:
I have paid all my life into our NHS system and would never travel abroad without appropriate insurance cover. 
It must be a pre-requisite in travelling to the UK shores
